channel.title: CVE Feed for ARC Informatique -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ARC Informatique -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2569|2024-09-16T19:31:39.555Z -- arc%20informatique -- pcvue%2012%20oauth%20web%20service%20configuration
item.description: The affected device stores sensitive information in cleartext, which may allow an authenticated user to access session data stored in the OAuth database belonging to legitimate users

item.title: CVE-2020-26867|2024-09-16T22:16:02.000Z -- arc%20informatique -- pcvue
item.description: ARC Informatique PcVue prior to version 12.0.17 is vulnerable due to the deserialization of untrusted data, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code on the web and mobile back-end server.
